statements: SELECT * FROM BirdMigrationPatterns ORDER BY bird_species ASC, migration_start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT bird_species, migration_start_date, migration_end_date FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE population_trend = 'Increasing' ORDER BY migration_start_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT bird_species, migration_distance FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE migration_distance >= 1000 ORDER BY migration_distance DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT bird_species, population_trend FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE population_trend IN ('Decreasing', 'Stable') ORDER BY bird_species ASC, population_trend DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, bird_species, migration_distance FROM BirdMigrationPatterns ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE bird_species = 'Robin'
SELECT bird_species, migration_distance FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE migration_distance > 1000 ORDER BY migration_distance DESC
SELECT bird_species, migration_start_date, migration_end_date FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE migration_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND migration_end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT bird_species, migration_distance, population_trend FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE population_trend = 'Stable' OR population_trend = 'Increasing' ORDER BY bird_species ASC
SELECT id, bird_species, migration_distance FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE migration_distance BETWEEN 500 AND 1500
SELECT bird_name FROM Birds;
SELECT bird_id, bird_name FROM Birds WHERE migration_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bird_id, bird_name, migration_start_date FROM Birds ORDER BY migration_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PopulationTrends WHERE population_count > 10000;
SELECT p.population_id, p.population_count, b.bird_name FROM PopulationTrends p JOIN Birds b ON p.bird_id = b.bird_id;
SELECT bird_name, migration_start_date FROM Birds WHERE bird_id = 1;
SELECT bird_name, migration_end_date FROM Birds WHERE bird_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY bird_id DESC;
SELECT bird_name, migration_start_date, migration_end_date FROM Birds ORDER BY migration_start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT population_count, population_date FROM PopulationTrends WHERE population_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT bird_id, bird_name, migration_start_date, migration_end_date, population_count, population_date FROM Birds JOIN PopulationTrends ON Birds.bird_id = PopulationTrends.bird_id WHERE population_count > 100 ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM BirdLocations;
SELECT bird_species, location FROM BirdLocations WHERE migration_season = 'Winter';
SELECT location, year, population_count FROM PopulationTrends WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT bird_species, route_description FROM MigrationRoutes WHERE migration_distance > 1000 ORDER BY migration_distance ASC;
SELECT bird_species, location, migration_season FROM BirdLocations JOIN MigrationRoutes ON BirdLocations.bird_species = MigrationRoutes.bird_species;
SELECT * FROM BirdLocations WHERE bird_species='Sparrow';
SELECT id, bird_species, location FROM BirdLocations WHERE migration_season='Fall' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT bird_species, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM BirdLocations GROUP BY bird_species HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM BirdLocations UNION SELECT DISTINCT location FROM PopulationTrends ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT bird_species, route_description, migration_distance FROM MigrationRoutes WHERE migration_distance >= 100 ORDER BY migration_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM BirdSpecies;
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM BirdSpecies WHERE migratory_status=true;
SELECT * FROM MigrationRecords ORDER BY migration_date DESC;
SELECT bird_id, COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM MigrationRecords GROUP BY bird_id;
SELECT pattern_name, season FROM MigrationPatterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM BirdSpecies
SELECT * FROM MigrationRecords WHERE migration_destination = 'North America'
SELECT pattern_name, season FROM MigrationPatterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC
SELECT species_name, habitat, migratory_status FROM BirdSpecies WHERE migratory_status = TRUE
SELECT DISTINCT habitat FROM BirdSpecies
SELECT * FROM birds;
SELECT bird_id, species FROM birds WHERE migration_distance > 1000;
SELECT bird_id, migration_start_date, migration_end_date FROM birds ORDER BY migration_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sightings WHERE location = 'Central Park' AND sighting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT bird_id, population_size, observation_date FROM populations WHERE bird_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM birds WHERE species = 'Sparrow';
SELECT bird_id, species, migration_distance FROM birds WHERE migration_distance > 1000 ORDER BY migration_distance DESC;
SELECT bird_id, species, migration_start_date, migration_end_date FROM birds JOIN populations ON birds.bird_id = populations.bird_id WHERE population_size > 10000 ORDER BY migration_start_date ASC;
SELECT s.bird_id, s.location, s.sighting_date, b.species FROM sightings s JOIN birds b ON s.bird_id = b.bird_id WHERE s.sighting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT p.bird_id, p.observation_date, w.temperature, w.wind_speed FROM populations p JOIN weather_conditions w ON p.observation_date = w.weather_date WHERE w.temperature < 20;
